title: Cognitive Load Theory-Based SQL Query Writing Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic database concepts and understanding of simple SQL syntax
context.additional_context: Enhancing data analysis competencies for social sciences, combining online activities and offline practice using digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Learners can write intermediate-level SQL queries with 80% accuracy.
Learners can represent data relationships with 90% accuracy by utilizing JOINs and subqueries in complex queries.
Learners can efficiently solve complex data request problems with over 70% accuracy using Pseudo-SQL and query templates.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
